properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 4 at 4:39AM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
Wind gusts between 60 and 75 mph have been reported along sections
of I-580 and US-395 south of Reno and across Washoe Valley early
this morning ahead of a fast moving weather system. These strong
winds will continue at times through mid-morning before decreasing
by late morning.

Expect travel restrictions for high profile vehicles on these
sections of I-580 and US-395. Even if your vehicle type is not
prohibited, use extra caution or postpone travel between Reno and
Carson City until these winds decrease later this morning.

NWSheadline: Strong Winds This Morning Between Reno and Carson City
